product_title: ASUS ROG Strix GeForce RTX 5070 Ti OC Edition 16GB GDDR7 Graphics Card (PCIe 5.0, HDMI/DP 2.1, 3.2-slot, Axial-tech fans, MaxContact design with vapor chamber, phase-change GPU thermal pad, aura sync)
about_product: AI Performance: 1492 AI TOPS. GPU Tweak III software provides intuitive performance tweaking, advanced thermal control, and system monitoring
OC Edition: 2625 MHz OC mode, 2602 MHz default mode
3.2-slot design: massive fin array optimized for airflow from the three Axial-tech fans
Axial-tech fans have been scaled up to propel more air through the card to reach higher performance
0dB technology lets you enjoy light gaming in relative silence
MaxContact design with vapor chamber ensures efficient heat transfer, providing a premium performance
Phase-change GPU thermal pad helps ensure optimal heat transfer, lowering GPU temperatures for enhanced performance and reliability
Premium power delivery with digital power control and 15K caps ensure high performance
Protective PCB Coating envelops the circuit board to help protect against short-circuits caused by moisture, dust, or debris
Aura Sync features Aura-compatible ARGB lighting on the shroud and perimeter allows endless personalization
product_description: The premium performance ASUS ROG Strix GeForce RTX 5070 Ti, featuring advanced cooling system with axial-tech fan, vapor chamber, phase-change GPU thermal pad, and MaxContact design, lowering GPU temperature to reach higher performance. Aura sync provides endless possibilities for personalization with color or functional effects.

product_details.Video Output Interface: Native DisplayPort 2.1b x3, Native HDMI 2.1b x 2

customers_say: Customers praise the graphics card's performance, particularly its solid 120 fps frame rate in most single-player games, and appreciate its stellar cooling that keeps temperatures below 50 degrees Celsius. Moreover, the card receives positive feedback for its design, with one customer noting its premium appearance, and its quiet operation under load. However, opinions on value are mixed, with some finding it excellent while others consider it pricey. Additionally, customers disagree on the size, with some finding it perfect for compact builds while others note it takes up almost three rear slots.

top_reviews.review_comment: It's just great. Top level premium materials for a top level gpu. Easy to install, great cooling and even greater performance. I was looking to upgrade my 1660 super to a 4070 ti super but waited for current generation and ended up getting this 5070 ti. Size is quite big, so not actually suitable for small PC cases. I got a bigger case specifically for this build and I don't regret it. Graphics and performance are awesome. So far only tested cyberpunk 2077 on a x570 gaming plus with a Ryzen 9 5950x and it outstands expectations. It'd indeed perform way better on newer builds but still works amazingly. 10/10 would recommend.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Outstanding Performance and Value – A Worthy Upgrade
top_reviews.review_comment: The ASUS 5070 Ti has exceeded my expectations in every way. The visual performance is outstanding, delivering sharp, fluid graphics that mark a significant improvement over my previous GPU. Whether I'm gaming or handling graphic-intensive tasks, this card performs reliably and efficiently. It’s a substantial upgrade that has noticeably enhanced my overall experience. For anyone seeking strong performance at a competitive price point, I highly recommend the 5070 Ti—it offers excellent value and capability.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: This GPU is the greatest purchase I have ever made. Finding a good-looking white GPU was difficult, but coming across this one was a miracle. It drastically improved my gaming experience. My PC runs very fast now and temperature stays between 35F to 45F. The only thing better than the functionality of this GPU is the way it makes my PC look. The aesthetic may not be important to everyone, but if it is to you like it is to me, then this GPU is for you.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Outstanding GFX Card For The Price
top_reviews.review_comment: I’ve been running the ASUS TUF Gaming RTX 4070 Ti for a few weeks now, and I couldn’t be more impressed. This card delivers outstanding performance, easily handling everything I throw at it — from 1440p ultra settings to smooth 4K gaming — with excellent frame rates and headroom for future titles. Why I think it’s a fantastic buy: Top-tier performance: It chews through AAA games at high settings, and paired with DLSS 3, it makes demanding titles feel buttery smooth. Efficient and cool: ASUS’s cooling design is excellent — the card runs quietly and temperatures stay impressively low even under heavy load. Solid build quality: The TUF series really lives up to its name here. This thing feels premium and durable, with no sag and a robust backplate. For the price: While it’s not “cheap,” the performance you get compared to higher-tier cards like the 4080 or 4090 makes this an exceptional value. It hits the sweet spot for serious gamers who want top-notch performance without totally blowing the budget. If you’re looking for a card that can handle today’s demanding games and be ready for what’s next — this is it. Highly recommended!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Beautiful performance for the price. Love this!
top_reviews.review_comment: What can i say here. Build my 3rd custom PC with this bad boy and while my PC cost about $2400 (I named my PC 'Financial Folly 2400'), the Video card was an extremely good price for what I feel i got from it. I cant think of a single time i have heard excess noise from this thing, the frame rates are good with pretty much anything I play, and the heat levels are well within expected parameters. Its a great video card for someone who wants power and performance without the super hefty price tags of late. Size is fairly large, but what video card isn't now a days. The brace they send with it definitely didn't work for me. It also integrated quite nicely with my ASUS fans and MOBO using ARMOURY Crate
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Super solid card (but nothing crazy either)
top_reviews.review_comment: Super solid card. The 5070 was pretty underwhelming, the TI made up for it completely. It performs well, overclocks pretty well as well. Sleek design which fits (almost) any build. I only have two *gripes* with it: it’s a lil big and bulky, and the pricing. The 5070ti is a good card, but you’re effectively buying a 4080. Possibly paying a lil more or a lil less depending on certain deals you may find. I would 100% recommend this card if you’re upgrading from a 3000/2000 series card but if you’re already rocking a 4060 or a 4070, the price for performance increases just simply isn’t enough. Which to be fair, is at no fault of ASUS, it’s more of a NVIDIA thing. Just something to think about. It also comes with a support bracket which is nice. When looking up reviews online of this card, you tend to see quite a bit of hate on it as people were expecting far more from this newest generation, which is fair. But just know you’re getting a marginally better 4080. TLDR: Good card, great even. Not worth it if you have a 4000 series card. Looks cool.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Fantastic card as expected for $200 over MSRP. Works perfectly and quiet and cool. Wish nvidia would get their head out of their arse and fix the prices.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: This thing is monstrous, much bigger than you think it is. Check dimensions before buying. On my setup, I can play cyberpunk 2077 on MAX graphics at 1440p including Ray tracing and path tracing maxed out at 60fps. With dlss enabled to dlaa, 100. With dlss enabled at quality setting, it doesn't dip below 165fps. I have yet to see the card touch 60°F. It's metal, sleek, it's cool, stays cool, and it took 5 minutes to install and considering I had a Nvidia card before it recognized it immediately and driver update took 2 minutes. Painless purchase. Now I can see the strippers in GTA VI in 8k or something idk
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2025

top_reviews_global.review_title: Justo lo que esperaba de Asus, nunca defrauda
top_reviews_global.review_comment: Sin duda la mejor RTX serie 5000
exelente! 10/10 , pense que no llegaria bien .. pero todo original y empaque normal.. pero funcional! producto nuevo de paquete.. gracias!

top_reviews_global.review_title: Great performance but whines a little when ramping up.
top_reviews_global.review_comment: Bought as part of a new build paired w/ ASUS TUF X870-Plus Wifi and AMD 9700X. All housed in a NZXT H7 Flow (2024). Plays all games on ultra with no difficulty. There is a little whine as it ramps up, but once warm it quiets down. Super happy with the purchase.

top_reviews_global.review_title: Excelente opción para renderizar y jugar
top_reviews_global.review_comment: Lo que más me gustó: Relación calidad-precio excepcional: Esta tarjeta ofrece un rendimiento sólido sin romper el presupuesto. Para el rango de precio en el que se encuentra, es difícil encontrar algo mejor en el mercado actual. 16GB de VRAM - Un verdadero diferenciador: Los 16GB de memoria de video son la estrella de esta tarjeta. Para trabajos de renderizado, edición de video o incluso gaming en resoluciones altas con texturas detalladas, esta cantidad de VRAM marca una diferencia notable. Ya no tengo que preocuparme por limitaciones de memoria al trabajar con proyectos pesados. Rendimiento consistente: En gaming mantiene framerates estables en 1440p con configuraciones altas, y para renderizado 3D los tiempos se han reducido considerablemente comparado con mi tarjeta anterior. Construcción sólida: La calidad de construcción típica de Asus se nota. Temperaturas controladas y funcionamiento silencioso durante uso normal. Consideraciones: El único punto a considerar es que para gaming 4K extremo podría necesitar algunos ajustes en configuraciones, pero para la mayoría de usuarios esto no será un problema. Veredicto: Si buscas una tarjeta que balance precio, rendimiento y especialmente memoria VRAM para renderizado, esta RTX 5070ti es una compra inteligente. Los 16GB la hacen muy competitiva para creadores de contenido y gamers que planean mantener la tarjeta por varios años. Recomendada para: Gaming 1440p, renderizado 3D, edición de video, y usuarios que buscan buena relación calidad-precio. Llevo 1 mes usandola sin ningún problema
2K gaming or 4K gaming is a no issue.. temps never go above 65°C.. awesome cool performance..
